document.full_text: somali pirates have freed the panama-flagged bulk carrier mv renuar and its crew of 24 filipinos after four months in captivity, the european union's anti-piracy task force said on thursday.
document.title: somali pirates release panama-flagged bulk carrier
lines_and_colors: somali pirates have freed the panama-flagged bulk carrier mv renuar and its crew of 24 filipinos after four months in captivity, the european union's anti-piracy task force said on thursday.
